title: How often are people getting champion shards?
body: I got one, bard champ shard, in the last couple months. I'd say I get 95% skin shards and 5% champion shards. I was just wondering if this is normal or is it a bug or is my luck just really bad?

replies.body: Skin shards are better than champion shards since you can buy a random champion shard for 1700 ip. I only use champion shards to disenchant into essence to get mastery 6 champions.
Yeah I value skin shards more as well but I want those champ shards so I can get masteries 6 and 7 on my mains lol.
